original_text: He set the sticks that he had peeled in front of the flocks in the troughs, that is, the watering places, where the flocks came to drink. And since they bred when they came to drink,
korean_text: 그 껍질 벗긴 가지를 양 떼가 와서 먹는 개천의 물 구유에 세워 양 떼를 향하게 하매 그 떼가 물을 먹으러 올 때에 새끼를 배니

sentences.original_text: He set the sticks that he had peeled
in front of the flocks in the troughs
where the flocks came to drink
sentences.korean_translation: 가축 떼가 물을 마시러 오던 곳이었다

sentences.original_text: And since they bred when they came to drink
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 물을 마시러 올 때 번식했으므로
